name: Brush Creek
description:
Introduction

Cool hike in, Would not recommend this canyon due to long inclined hike out

Approach

From road, down ridge, into tributary.

Descent

  • R1 20 ft
  • R2 50
  • R3 20
  • R4 20 or downclimb

Canyon roughly begins around 900 ft and ends around 600.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
